ing: 1 (6 ounce) can frozen orange juice concentrate
1 (6 fluid ounce) container frozen grape juice concentrate
des: "A great fruity punch made with orange juice, lemon juice, grape juice and canned fruit punch. It's carbonated with ginger ale and has blood red oranges floating an top."
ins: In a large punch bowl, combine fruit punch, lemonade concentrate, orange juice concentrate and grape juice concentrate. Stir in the water, then the ginger ale. Float orange slices on top.
